name: Digital Marketplace
notes: <dl> <dt> What is the Digital Marketplace? <dd> This beta release of the Digital Marketplace provides a richer and simpler environment for technology procurement, enabling businesses, especially SMEs and start-ups, to provide specialist digital services to Government. Our vision is for an end to end digital environment which accommodates the level of simplicity creativity and structure appropriate to each procurement interaction. <dt> Who is the user group of the Hobby or Business Help Me Work It Out Tool? <dd> Government buyers and sellers of digital services are the primary target user groups. <dt> User Satisfaction <dd> We will update the Dashboard in the near future with this data. <dt> Cost per Transaction <dd> We will update the Dashboard in the near future with this data. <dt> Digital Take-up <dd> We will update the Dashboard in the near future with this data. <dt> Completion Rate <dd> We will update the Dashboard in the near future with this data. <dt> Metrics relating to the operations of the marketplace will be published as the data becomes available. </dl>

widgets.name: User Satisfaction
widgets.definition: Overall satisfaction score includes all ratings weighted from 100% for very satisfied to 0% for very dissatisfied

widgets.name: Completion Rate
widgets.definition: Percentage of transactions made using the digital service.
